trans-unit.source: Scenario 6 - Remote Sites backing up locally and replicating to the Central Site

seg-source.mrk: Scenario 6 - Remote Sites backing up locally and replicating to the Central Site

target.mrk: Scénario 6 - Sites distants avec sauvegarde locale et réplication vers le site central

trans-unit.source: The diagram (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario6" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustrates the local backup process of remote sites and their replication to the central site.

seg-source.mrk: The diagram (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario6" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustrates the local backup process of remote sites and their replication to the central site.

target.mrk: Le schéma (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario6" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustre le processus de sauvegarde locale des sites distants et leur réplication vers le site central.

trans-unit.source: Scenario 6

seg-source.mrk: Scenario 6

target.mrk: Scénario 6

trans-unit.source: Securing the environment is managed by:

seg-source.mrk: Securing the environment is managed by:

target.mrk: La sécurisation de l’environnement est gérée par :

trans-unit.source: Replicating remote office <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />(s) to the central site to prevent data loss

seg-source.mrk: Replicating remote office <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />(s) to the central site to prevent data loss

target.mrk: La réplication du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> du site distant vers le site central pour éviter des pertes de données

trans-unit.source: Remote <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />s are also protected by stopping the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and taking a snapshot.

seg-source.mrk: Remote <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />s are also protected by stopping the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and taking a snapshot.

target.mrk: Le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> distant est également protégé par l’arrêt du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et la prise d’un snapshot.

trans-unit.source: Central <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is secured by mirroring to another <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (this is known as failover).

seg-source.mrk: Central <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is secured by mirroring to another <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (this is known as failover).

target.mrk: Le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> central est sécurisé en effectuant une copie miroir vers un autre <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (failover).

trans-unit.source: Central <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is backed up through script and snapshot (which is supported by the disk array) to prevent <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> corruption.

seg-source.mrk: Central <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is backed up through script and snapshot (which is supported by the disk array) to prevent <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> corruption.

target.mrk: Le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> central est sauvegardé via un script et un snapshot (supporté par la baie de disques) pour éviter la corruption du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

alt-trans.seg-source: Central <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is backed up by the List Application or through script and snapshot (which is supported by the disk array) to prevent <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> corruption.
alt-trans.target: Le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> central est sauvegardé par l’application List ou via un script de snapshot (supporté par la baie de disques) pour éviter la corruption du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Procédure

target.mrk: Les processus de restauration dans le scénario 6

trans-unit.source: Scenario

seg-source.mrk: Scenario

target.mrk: Scénario

trans-unit.source: Restore Process

seg-source.mrk: Restore Process

target.mrk: Processus de restauration

trans-unit.source: Remote HyperStream Server crashes (data loss). A spare server will be rebuilt at the datacenter; once the process is completed, this new HyperStream server will be shipped to the remote site.

seg-source.mrk: Remote HyperStream Server crashes (data loss).
A spare server will be rebuilt at the datacenter; once the process is completed, this new HyperStream server will be shipped to the remote site.

target.mrk: Le serveur HyperStream distant subit un crash (perte de données).
Un serveur de rechange est reconstruit au datacenter, puis le nouveau serveur HyperStream est expédié au site distant.

trans-unit.source: Backup and restore will be possible through the central HyperStream server.

seg-source.mrk: Backup and restore will be possible through the central HyperStream server.

target.mrk: La sauvegarde et la restauration restent possibles grâce au serveur HyperStream central du datacenter.

trans-unit.source: See <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Scenario5_Restore_Damaged_Rep_HSS.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Scenario 5 - Restore of a Damaged Replicated HyperStream Server (over the WAN)</MadCap:xref> for details.

seg-source.mrk: See <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Scenario5_Restore_Damaged_Rep_HSS.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Scenario 5 - Restore of a Damaged Replicated HyperStream Server (over the WAN)</MadCap:xref> for details.

target.mrk: Voir <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Scenario5_Restore_Damaged_Rep_HSS.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Scenario 5 - Restore of a Damaged Replicated HyperStream Server (over the WAN)</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: Remote HyperStream Server is corrupt. Use local snapshot to restore a viable version of the database.

seg-source.mrk: Remote HyperStream Server is corrupt.
Use local snapshot to restore a viable version of the database.

target.mrk: Le serveur HyperStream distant est corrompu.
Utilisez un snapshot local pour restaurer une version exploitable de la base de données.

trans-unit.source: Technical Assistance of Atempo Professional Services is required.

seg-source.mrk: Technical Assistance of Atempo Professional Services is required.

target.mrk: Faire appel aux Services Professionnels Atempo.

trans-unit.source: Central HyperStream Server crashes (data loss). Failover HyperStream Server is automatically available for backup and restore.

seg-source.mrk: Central HyperStream Server crashes (data loss).
Failover HyperStream Server is automatically available for backup and restore.

target.mrk: Le serveur HyperStream central subit un crash (perte de données).
Le serveur de secours en copie miroir (failover) est immédiatement disponible pour sauvegarder ou restaurer.

trans-unit.source: Central HyperStream Server can then be rebuilt.

seg-source.mrk: Central HyperStream Server can then be rebuilt.

target.mrk: Le serveur HyperStream central peut ensuite être reconstruit.

trans-unit.source: See <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Scenario3_Restore_Damaged_Mirror.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Scenario 3 - Restore of a Damaged Mirror</MadCap:xref> for details.

seg-source.mrk: See <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Scenario3_Restore_Damaged_Mirror.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Scenario 3 - Restore of a Damaged Mirror</MadCap:xref> for details.

target.mrk: Voir <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Scenario3_Restore_Damaged_Mirror.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Scenario 3 - Restore of a Damaged Mirror</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: Central HyperStream Server is corrupt. Rebuild from the disk array snapshot by restoring a viable version of the database.

seg-source.mrk: Central HyperStream Server is corrupt.
Rebuild from the disk array snapshot by restoring a viable version of the database.

target.mrk: Le serveur HyperStream central est corrompu.
Il doit être reconstruit depuis le snapshot de la baie de stockage par restauration d’une version exploitable de la base de données.

trans-unit.source: Technical Assistance of Atempo Professional Services is required.

seg-source.mrk: Technical Assistance of Atempo Professional Services is required.

target.mrk: Faire appel aux Services Professionnels Atempo.
